title: Want Energy Blackouts? Vote Democrat | Guests: Sheriff Mike Smith & Kelly Shackelford | 6/15/22
description:
Texas is warning of possible power outages due to the excessive heat, but isn't that normal for Texas? Glenn and Stu go over the hypocritical responses to the power crisis. Utah County Sheriff Mike Smith discusses the demoralizing fall of some red counties as the crime rates spike due to soft Republicans. Pat Gray joins Glenn and Stu to discuss the recent Supreme Court decisions and the government's ineptitude on gas and oil. The Left is demanding the federal government step in to pay for more schooling. President and CEO of First Liberty Institute Kelly Shackelford joins to discuss the importance of school choice when it comes to taxpayer-funded schools. Glenn and Stu examine how President Biden's overspending proves the Right is correct.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
